text: Thomas W. "Tom" Corbett (born June 17, 1949) is an American politician. He was the 46th Governor of Pennsylvania from 2011 to 2015. He was Attorney General of Pennsylvania before that. His performance had mixed reviews. The popularity of him was very low in the polls. He lost his re-election campaign in 2014 to Tom Wolf. ==References== Category:Republican Party (United States) politicians Category:Governors of Pennsylvania Category:1949 births Category:Living people Category:Pennsylvania attorneys general
title: Tom Corbett
